About Me

I help companies from all over the world with tailor-made solutions. With each project, I push my work to new horizons, always putting quality first.

Always exploring...

My Expertise

  • 01. Design

    With a solid track record in designing websites, I deliver strong and user-friendly digital designs.

  • 02. Development

    I build scalable websites from scratch that fit seamlessly with design. My focus is on micro animations, transitions and interaction.

  • 03. The full package

    A complete website from concept to implementation, that's what makes me stand out. My great sense for design and my development skills enable me to create kick-ass projects.

Awwwards

judge '19-24

I am a proud member of the Awwwards International Jury, where I judge the best websites in the world using my expertise as a designer and developer.

); } export default About;
